creator: eduardo.pelegrillopart@sun.com
text:
I have files A.jsp, dir/B.jsp, C.jsp and dir/C.jsp.

If File A.jsp @includes dir/B.jsp @includes C.jsp, the compiler complains that 
it cannot find C.jsp.

The correct anwser (as done in Tomcat 3.2 and Tomcat 3.3) is to find dir/C.jsp

   - eduard/o
*** Bug 2193 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
justyna.horwat@sun.com
text:
When the ParserController attempted to resolve the included filename, the base
directory substring was incorrectly created. Fixed in Tomcat 4.0.
